name: Dirty Trays
description:
Survive the virus and spray it away in your restaurant, Keep your guests safe you are the last line of defence on this one.

The game was completely developed within one week on my own, working to promote the washing of hands and how important is for restaurants and people to wash their hands to protect themselves and their guests during the outbreak of the Covid-19 virus. None of the content is made with the intent of being sensitive within the game. 

Please keep in mind i am not a modeller, animator or fontist. Therefore the game does lack in models and graphics. I DO intend on adding models and animations into the game but this game is finished in terms of game design elements. I am planning on adding extra game modes in the future too.

Credit and special thank you to:

 - Zacchary Dempsey-Plante for his font Pixellari à €  which is used within the game and was downloaded from https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font.

 - Grandad for the inspiration and the drive to do well within life you taught me, thank you.
